General.Name: Steady Safe TBK PT
General.Description: PT Steady Safe Tbk provides bus transportation services in Indonesia. The company operates in two segments, Land Transportation and Financial Services. It is also involved in the provision of financing, limousine rental, and taxi services. The company was formerly known as PT. Tanda Widjaja Sakti and changed its name to PT Steady Safe Tbk in December 1993. PT Steady Safe Tbk was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Steady Safe Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Infiniti Wahana.
General.Address: Gedung Satrio Tower, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12950
